thread.title: President Trump is awesome
thread.title_full: Gamecheap reviewed by President Trump is awesome

author: President Trump is awesome
title: President Trump is awesome
text: I purchased Windows 7 32 bit to update a 10 year old Toshiba laptop. Everything went smooth with download and burn to disc and install. I have never been able to get a USB drive to work for an install, don't know why but using a disc was as easy as it gets. I would recommend anyone to Gamecheap for this software! Oh, and the software activated with Microsoft without any issues :-)
